text: Gisostola bahiensis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Martins and Galileo in 1988. It is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Gisostola bahiensis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Forsteriini Category:Beetles described in 1988
title: Gisostola bahiensis
